description: A shorty but a goody to some decent size waterfalls in Guysborough County.  Isaacs Harbour River has a few sets of falls near where they meet the ocean. A logging road leads close to them and then an unofficial local rail lead right to them.
directions: Highway 316 to Eight Mile lake road.  Drive about 250m and look for a faint trail on the left,   Falls are at; N45° 12' 21.8" W61° 40' 27.8"
title: Isaacs Harbour River Falls
